question: A friend who lives in another country has invited you to come and stay with him/her on your next holiday. You are too busy to accept the invitation. Write a letter to your friend. In you letter, Thank him/her for the invitation.Explain why you cannot comeAsk him/her about other times to visit
text: I hope this letter finds you in  good health and spirits. It is really nice to hear about your holiday plans for me.

I am overjoyed to hear from you. From your letter, it seems it will be a great vacation. Thank you for this wonderful invitation. But, my brother is getting married this winter. My family just recently fixed the wedding date. I was in the process of sending a wedding invitation when I got your offer. I am sorry! I cannot come to Australia this winter.
On a positive note, my family and I will be delighted if you would make it to the marriage on the 26th of December. Therefore, if possible, I would like to visit you next summer.
